definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names
Big Mac Index, a measure of the purchasing power parity (PPP) between currencies
pinyin: Ju4 wu2 ba4 han4 bao3 bao1 Zhi3 shu4

sentences.english: He had his habitual breakfast, hamburger and ham sandwich every morning.
sentences.chinese: 他每天早上都是惯常的早餐，汉堡包和火腿三明治。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, all I can afford today is a Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，今天我只吃得起一个大的麦当劳汉堡。

sentences.english: For men, the most-ordered item is burgers, followed by french fries and pizza.
sentences.chinese: 男性点的最多的是汉堡，其次是薯条和比萨饼。

sentences.english: Turned free and easy of go away, let figure burger in your mind.
sentences.chinese: 转身洒脱的走开，让你的头脑中留下美图汉堡的印象。

sentences.english: The school canteen provides hamburgers, sandwiches, pizza and so on.
sentences.chinese: 学校食堂提供汉堡，三明治，比萨饼等等。

sentences.english: Now, why did she call it a Ghetto Burger?
sentences.chinese: 那为什么她管这家店叫做“贫民区汉堡店”呢？

sentences.english: She had eaten a hamburger at a California fast-food chain.
sentences.chinese: 她在加利福尼亚的快餐连锁店吃了一个汉堡。

sentences.english: I had a hamburger,some French fries,and apple pie and a Coke.
sentences.chinese: 我吃一个汉堡包，一些薯条，以及苹果派和一杯可乐。

sentences.english: You can put pig's belly or lean meat in the steamed sandwich, which can beat McDonald's Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 割包可以选五花肉或瘦肉，中国的汉堡不输麦当劳。

sentences.english: I have a coupon for buy a hamburger get one on free.
sentences.chinese: 我有一张买一个汉堡就送一个的优惠卷。

sentences.english: My doctor told me not to eat fatty foods such as bacon or ham.
sentences.chinese: 我的医生叫我不要吃油腻的食物，比如咸肉或汉堡。

sentences.english: You may rind McDonald＇s, Kentucky Fried Chicken, hainburger shops everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 你会在任何地方找到麦当劳，肯塔基炸鸡，汉堡包店。

sentences.english: I dare you to skateboard to Krusty Burger and back.
sentences.chinese: 我说你不敢踩着滑板往返库里斯蒂汉堡。

sentences.english: China is building a high-speed freight rail line all the way to Hamburg Germany.
sentences.chinese: 中国正在建设一条高速货运铁路线，直达德国汉堡。

sentences.english: Uncle and I are standing in line at the hamburger kiosk.
sentences.chinese: 我和叔叔排队站在汉堡包摊前。

definition: Nürnberg or Nuremberg, town in Bavaria, Germany
Copenhagen or København, capital of Denmark
München or Munich, capital of Bavaria, Germany
